Function template make_weighted_profile

boost::histogram::make_weighted_profile — Make profle from compile-time axis configuration which accepts weights.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/make_profile.hpp>


template<typename Axis, class... Axes> 
  auto make_weighted_profile(Axis && axis, Axes &&... axes);

Description

Parameters:

axes

Other axis instances.

axis

First axis instance.
